items.title: GPU cluster provisioned

items.description: Distribute compute across AWS regions for redundancy

items.title: Baseline model trained
items.description:
First iteration of protein structure prediction model

- 85% accuracy on validation set
- 2M parameters
- Training time: 48 hours

items.title: V2 model in training
items.description:
Improved architecture with attention mechanisms

- 94% accuracy on validation set (up from 85%)
- Novel attention mechanism for long-range interactions
- 3x faster inference

items.title: Training data quality issues
items.description: Found inconsistencies in labeled dataset affecting model convergence

items.description: Prepare manuscript for peer review

items.description: Large-scale pre-trained model for multiple downstream tasks
